@graph.name: Analyse Argo data
@graph.description:
Process argo data with the Pangeo Ecosystem and visualise them with Ocean Data View (ODV)

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Analyse Argo data](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/climate/tutorials/argo_pangeo/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
